articles.author: Chris Ryan | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: New Jersey Devils vs. Montreal Canadiens: LIVE score updates and chat (3/6/18)
articles.description: Taylor Hall, Keith Kinkaid, Nico Hischier, Jesper Bratt and the New Jersey Devils will play their first and only home game of the season against the Montreal Canadiens when the teams face off at 7 p.m. on Tuesday at the Prudential Center in Newark.

articles.author: Karen Yi | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: After more than 20 years, state takeover of Newark schools is over
articles.description: Control of Newark public schools will fully return to the school district after the state took over in 1995.

articles.author: Karen Yi | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Mom files class-action suit claiming building is rat infested
articles.description: Yanira Cortes, a tenant at Pueblo City apartments in Newark, said she's taking her landlord to court after months of no repairs and rats that terrorize her four children.

articles.author: Susan K. Livio | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Murphy says he will accept $175K salary as governor
articles.description: Jon Corzine declined all but $1. Chris Christie accepted the $175,000 salary.

articles.author: Barry Carter | The Star-Ledger
articles.title: Newark social justice group hails decision to close juvenile facility | Carter
articles.description: The New Jersey Institute for Social Justice lauds the state's decision to close juvenile facility.

articles.author: Chris Ryan | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: What Devils need to see following players-only meeting
articles.description: The Devils held a players-only meeting following Monday's loss to the Red Wings.

articles.author: Matthew Stanmyre | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: 2,168 days of losing: Can a Hail Mary save N.J.'s most tortured team?
articles.description: Newark East Side's football team has tried desperately to break what is believed to be the state's longest losing streak. But can they do it?

articles.author: Matt Arco | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: You'll miss me, Jersey! And with that, Chris Christie's just getting warmed up
articles.description: Proud and feisty, blunt and still fighting, Chris Christie doesn't hold back in his final NJ Advance Media interview before leaving office next Tuesday.

articles.author: Patrick Villanova | The Jersey Journal
articles.title: Hoboken halts effort to acquire dry dock
articles.description: Hoboken Mayor Ravi Bhalla has suspended an effort to acquire the Union Dry Dock through eminent domain in hopes that Gov. Phil Murphy will table NJ Transit's dueling plan to purchase the land and turn it into a ferry maintenance facility.

articles.title: Will Devils forward Kyle Palmieri play Thursday vs. Oilers?
articles.description: Kyle Palmieri could return to the Devils' lineup on Thursday.

articles.author: Karen Yi | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Building sued over rats and roaches sold as inspector warns of black mold
articles.description: A mother of four filed a class-action suit over conditions in her building. Now her landlord has sold Pueblo City Apartments to a new owner.

articles.author: Karen Yi | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Amid calls for resignation, college administrator placed on paid leave
articles.description: The Essex County College vice president of administration and finance was placed on paid administrative leave by the Board of Trustees on Tuesday.

articles.author: Kelly Heyboer | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: From maggots to 'suicide rooms,' inside N.J.'s immigrant detention centers
articles.description: Asylum seekers and other immigrants in New Jersey detention facilities complain about bad food, dirty water and inadequate medical care, according to a new report.

articles.title: Plenty to do in Hudson County this week
articles.description: Fall is currently in full swing in Hudson County. Although the weather is getting colder, there is still plenty for people to do throughout the week.

articles.title: Hoboken suspends eminent domain effort to acquire Union Dry Dock
articles.description: Hoboken Mayor Ravi Bhalla has suspended an effort to acquire the Union Dry Dock.

articles.author: Ted Sherman | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Is there a future doctor in the house? Some will find out on Christmas
articles.description: George Heinrich has a holiday tradition he keeps every Christmas. The college dean calls aspiring doctors to let them know they have been accepted to medical school.

articles.author: Karin Price Mueller | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
articles.title: Bamboozled: Should United honor refund promised after hurricane hit Puerto Rico?
articles.description: A United Airlines rep wrongly told a couple they would get a refund after cancelling a trip to hurricane-damaged Puerto Rico.
